actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide flexibility in adjusting the maximum pay rate for public service jobs in high cost of living areas.

summary.text: Authorizes increases in the maximum pay rate for public service jobs in areas where the cost of living is 15 percent or more above the national average.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide flexibility in adjusting the maximum pay rate for public service jobs in high cost of living areas.
